mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(price), 0) as status from expense where insert_date like CONCAT(#{insert_date},'%') and moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name} union all select ifnull(sum(price), 0) from earnings where insert_date like CONCAT(#{insert_date},'%') and moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name} union all select ifnull(sum(p.price), 0) from assetprice p,(select ano from asset where moneybook_name = #{moneybook_name}) a where p.ano = a.ano
